content.rendered:
Directed by Manoj Leonel Jason. Shyam Sunder

Written by G. Rajesh

Star Kalaiyarasan. Aadhira Pandilakshmi. Anjali Patil. Anand Sami (Stewart Koteeswaran)

Language Tamil

Producers Pa. Ranjith. Vignesh Sundaresan

Production Neelam Productions. Yaazhi Films
